event.name: Atomik::Render::Start
event.description: Fired at the beginning of a call to Atomik::render().
event.refparam: Whether to echo the view output or return it
Whether to throw an exception when the view file is missing

event.name: Atomik::Render::Before
event.description: Fired before the inclusion of the view file.
event.refparam: Whether to echo the view output or return it
Whether to throw an exception when the view file is missing

event.name: Atomik::Render::After
event.description: Fired after the inclusion of the view file.
event.refparam: Whether to echo the view output or return it
Whether to throw an exception when the view file is missing

event.name: Atomik::Render::Output::Before
event.refparam: The content that will be echoed

event.name: Atomik::Render::Output::After
event.description: Fired after content has been echoed.
event.param: The content that has been echoed
